data.message:
A Tribute to Original Coke Zero
What happened Coke Zero, What did you do?
To make your Coke masters, decide to change you.
Were you misunderstood? Your fans don’t think so!
We loved you as you were, a friend not a foe.
You were just sweet enough, with the right type of bubbles
You were there for our wins, consoled us through troubles,
Pepsi Max was our choice, before you came along,
You gave us a reason, to sing Coke’s festive song.
But now you have changed, and we miss you a lot.
Goodbye Coke Zero, once the best that it got.
